text: The 2019–20 Deportivo Toluca F.C. season is the 103rd season in the football club's history and the 67th consecutive season in the top flight of Mexican football. ==Coaching staff== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:100%; width:35%;" |- !
